comments_since_last_sample.body: Christina, I absolutely love, love, love the black wash. The piece looks great and I too like a flat finish most of the time.
I didn’t see the information or link to the lint-free wipes in your description. Please advise.

Loveeee this!!! I don’t see those rags in the description box linked or am I missing something?! I have been using shop towels and good god do I need a tonnnnn to do washes and I feel like it makes it expensive as those towels aren’t cheap 🤦🏼‍♀️
